scripts.build: npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.make: npm run make-client && npm run make-server
scripts.make-client: npm run build-client && cpr build-client/client/src client/lib/src --overwrite --delete-first && cpr build-client/common/src client/lib/src
scripts.make-server: npm run build-server && cpr build-server/server/src server/lib/src --overwrite --delete-first && cpr build-server/common/src server/lib/src
scripts.typings-install: npm run typings-install-common && npm run typings-install-client && npm run typings-install-server
